mapper.select: /*kr.happyjob.study.adm.dao.SurveyDao.surveyTeacherListCnt*/ select count(*) from tb_userinfo where user_type = 'B'
select count(*) from tb_lecture lc inner join tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = lc.loginID where lc.loginID = #{loginID}

select sl.servey_no ,sl.serveyitem_queno , sum(case when sl.num = 1 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer1 , sum(case when sl.num = 2 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer2 , sum(case when sl.num = 3 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer3 , sum(case when sl.num = 4 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer4 , sum(case when sl.num = 5 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer5 , sl.serveyitem_question from ( select ts.servey_no ,ts.serveyitem_queno ,ts.serveyitem_question ,ts.num ,ifnull(ll.cnt,0) as cnt from ( select ts.servey_no ,ts.serveyitem_queno ,ts.serveyitem_question ,ll.num from tb_serveyitem ts , ( select 1 as num union select 2 as num union select 3 as num union select 4 as num union select 5 as num ) ll ) ts left outer join ( select servey_no ,serveyitem_queno ,servey_answer ,count(*) as cnt from tb_servey where lecture_seq = #{lecture_seq} group by servey_no,serveyitem_queno,servey_answer ) ll on ll.serveyitem_queno = ts.serveyitem_queno and ll.servey_no = ts.servey_no and ll.servey_answer = ts.num order by ts.servey_no ,ts.serveyitem_queno ,ts.num ) sl where serveyitem_queno = #{serveyitem_queno} group by sl.servey_no ,sl.serveyitem_queno
